title: Greek pharma innovation faces bleak future, industry wants ‘urgent changes’ [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Clawbacks, discontinued therapies, delays, lay-offs and disinvestment have created a concerning pharma business environment in Greece, industry has warned
summary_public: Clawbacks, discontinued therapies, delays, lay-offs and disinvestment have created a concerning pharma business environment in Greece, industry has warned

GR.label: negative
GR.evidence: Greek pharma innovation faces bleak future, industry wants ‘urgent changes’
